Applicant Privacy Policy
Last Updated: May 18, 2023
label: neutral

text: The purpose of this Applicant Privacy Policy (“Policy”) is to provide you with information about how DataRobot, Inc. (the “Company,” “DataRobot,” “we,” “us” and/or “our”) processes your personal data collected during the recruitment process.
label: neutral

text: This Policy describes the categories of personal information collected by the Company and the purposes for which such information may be collected and used.
label: neutral

text: This Policy applies to any individuals who submit an application for an advertised position, provide their personal data for general employment inquiries, or otherwise seek to work for DataRobot, regardless of the manner in which you provide your personal data.
label: neutral

text: This Policy applies in addition to our general Privacy Policy.
label: neutral

text: Please refer to the Privacy Policy for our practices related to personal data submitted for other purposes.
label: neutral

text: This Policy may be updated from time to time.
label: neutral

text: We will post any changes to this page.
label: neutral

text: For additional information about the Company’s data privacy practices, please review our Privacy Policy.
label: neutral

text:
Categories of Personal Information Collected
During the recruitment process, we may need to collect certain data about you, either from you directly, or from third parties with your approval.
label: neutral

text:
This data may include the following:

Identifiers and Contact information.
label: neutral

text: This category includes names, addresses, telephone numbers, mobile numbers, email addresses, signatures, account names, dates of birth, bank account information, and other similar contact information and identifiers.
label: neutral

text: Protected Classification Information.
label: neutral

text: This category includes characteristics of protected classifications under California or federal law.
label: neutral

text: Internet or Other Electronic Network Activity Information.
label: neutral

text:
This category includes, without limitation: 

all activity on the Company’s information systems, such as internet browsing history, search history, intranet activity, email communications, social media postings, stored documents and emails, usernames and passwords
all activity on communications systems, including phone calls, call logs, voice mails, text messages, chat logs, app use, mobile browsing and search history, mobile email communications, and other information regarding an employee’s use of company-issued devices.
label: neutral

text: This category includes, without limitation, GPS location data from company-owned or issued mobile devices, applications, or vehicles.
label: neutral

text: Audio, Electronic, Visual, Thermal, Olfactory, or Similar Information.
label: neutral

text: This category includes, for example, information collected from cameras, thermometers, and similar devices.
label: neutral

text: Biometric Information.
label: risk

text: This category includes the use of biometric equipment, devices, or software to record your time worked, to enter or exit facilities or rooms, to access or use equipment, or for other business purposes.
label: risk

text: Professional and Employment-Related Information.
label: neutral

text:
This category includes, without limitation:

data submitted with employment applications, including salary history, employment history, employment recommendations, etc.
background check and criminal history
work authorization
performance and disciplinary records
salary and bonus data
benefit plan enrollment, participation, and claims information
leave of absence information, including religious and family obligations, and physical and mental health data, concerning employees and their family members 
Education Information.
label: risk

text: This category includes, without limitation, education history.
label: neutral

text: Sensitive Personal Information.
label: neutral

text:
This category includes sensitive information such as:

social security, driver’s license, state identification card, or passport number
financial account information that allows access to an account, including log-in credentials, financial account numbers, passwords, etc.
precise geolocation
racial or ethnic origin,
content of mail, email, and text messages (unless the Company is the intended recipient of the communication) and
health information.
label: risk

text:
Purposes Personal Information, Including Sensitive Personal Information, Is Used
Data we collect about you as part of our recruitment process may be used for the following purposes:

Collecting and processing employment applications, including confirming eligibility for employment, background and related checks, onboarding, and related recruiting efforts.
label: neutral

text: Processing payroll, other forms of compensation, and employee benefit plan and program design and administration including enrollment and claims handling, and leave of absence administration.
label: neutral

text: Maintaining physician records and occupational health programs.
label: risk

text: Maintaining personnel records and record retention requirements.
label: neutral

text: Communicating with employees and/or employees’ emergency contacts and plan beneficiaries.
label: neutral

text: Complying with applicable state and federal health, labor, employment, benefits, workers compensation, disability, equal employment opportunity, workplace safety, and related laws, guidance, or recommendations.
label: risk

text: Preventing unauthorized access to, use, or disclosure/removal of the Company’s property, including the Company’s information systems, electronic devices, network, and data.
label: neutral

text: Ensuring and enhancing employee productivity and adherence to the Company’s policies.
label: neutral

text: Providing training and development opportunities.
label: neutral

text: Investigating complaints, grievances, and suspected violations of Company policy.
label: neutral

text: Designing, implementing, and promoting the Company’s diversity and inclusion programs.
label: neutral

text: Facilitating the efficient and secure use of the Company’s information systems.
label: neutral

text: Ensuring compliance with the Company information systems policies and procedures.
label: neutral

text: Improving safety of employees, customers and the public with regard to use of Company property and equipment.
label: neutral

text: Improving efficiency, logistics, and supply chain management.
label: neutral

text: Improving accuracy of time management systems and attendance, including vacation, sick leave, and other leave of absence monitoring.
label: neutral

text: Evaluating an individual’s appropriateness for a particular position at the Company, or promotion to a new position.
label: neutral

text: Managing customer engagement and other legitimate business purposes.
label: neutral

text: Responding to and managing legal claims against the Company and/or its personnel, including civil discovery in litigation.
label: neutral

text: Facilitating other business administrative functions and strategic activities, such as risk management, information technology and communications, financial management and reporting, workforce and succession planning, merger and acquisition activities, and maintenance of licenses, permits and authorization applicable to Company operations.
label: neutral

text: If you accept a position with DataRobot, your data will become part of your employment records.
label: neutral

text: At that point, your data will be subject to our applicable employee privacy policies.
label: neutral

text: If you are not hired, or elect to withdraw or decline our employment offer, we will retain your applicant data for three years unless a longer period is required by applicable law or to establish, exercise, or defend legal challenges related to our recruitment processes.
label: neutral

text: We hold your data for three years so that we may consider you for other positions that arise within our organization and to comply with our regulatory requirements.
label: neutral

text: We retain your personal information for as long as is necessary to process your application for employment, process your payroll, administer your benefits, etc. and in accordance with the Company’s data retention schedule.
label: neutral

text: We may retain your personal information for longer if it is necessary to comply with our legal or reporting obligations (for example, if we are required to retain your data to comply with applicable laws), resolve disputes, enforce our legal agreements and policies, address other legitimate business needs, or as permitted or required by applicable law.
label: neutral

text: We may also retain your personal information in a deidentified or aggregated form so that it can no longer be associated with you.
label: neutral

text: To determine the appropriate retention period for your personal information, we consider various factors such as the amount, nature, and sensitivity of your information; the potential risk of unauthorized access, use or disclosure; the purposes for which we collect or process your personal information; and applicable legal requirements.
label: neutral

text: Personal information does not include certain categories of information, such as publicly available information from government records, and deidentified or aggregated consumer information.
label: neutral

text: To carry out the purposes outlined above, the Company may disclose personal information to service providers or other third parties, such as background check vendors, third-party staffing vendors, information technology vendors, outside legal counsel, and state or federal governmental agencies.
label: info

text: In addition to the parties listed in the Privacy Policy, we may share your personal data with your references and your previous or current employers to perform professional reference and employment checks.
label: neutral

text: The Company does not sell or share, as those terms are defined under applicable law, the above categories of personal information.
label: risk

text: The Company may add to the categories of personal information it collects and the purposes for which it uses that information.
label: neutral

text: California Resident Individual Rights Requests.
label: neutral

text: Individuals who are residents of the State of California have certain individual rights, which are outlined below.
label: neutral

text: To Know About Personal Information Collected or Disclosed.
label: neutral

text:
As a California resident, you have the right to request additional information, beyond that disclosed above, regarding the following, to the extent applicable:

the categories of personal information the Company collected about you 
the categories of sources from which that personal information was collected 
the business or commercial purposes for which that information was collected, sold, or shared 
the categories of third parties to whom the information was disclosed
the specific pieces of personal information collected
Upon receipt of a verifiable request to know (see below), and as required by applicable law, we will provide a response to such request.
label: neutral

text: Right To Request Deletion of Your Personal Information.
label: neutral

text: You have the right to request that we delete the personal information we collected or maintain about you.
label: neutral

text: Once we receive your request, we will let you know what, if any, personal information we can delete from our records, and will direct any service providers and contractors to whom we disclosed your personal information to also delete your personal information from their records.
label: info

text: There may be circumstances where we cannot delete your personal information or direct service providers or contractors to delete your personal information from their records.
label: info

text: Such instances include, without limitation, when the information at issue is maintained: (a) to enable solely internal uses that are reasonably aligned with your expectations based on your relationship with the Company and compatible with the context in which you provided the information, or (b) to comply with a legal obligation.
label: neutral

text: Upon receipt of a verifiable request to delete (see below), and as required by applicable law, we will provide a response to such requests.
label: neutral

text: Right to Request Correction.
label: neutral

text: You have the right to request that the Company correct any inaccurate personal information we maintain about you, taking into account the nature of that information and purpose for processing it.
label: neutral

text: Upon receipt of a verifiable request to correct (see below), and as required by the CCPA, we will provide a response to such requests.
label: neutral

text: Right to Limit Use or Disclosure of Sensitive Personal Information.
label: neutral

text: You have the right, subject to certain exceptions, to request that we limit the use and disclosure of your sensitive personal information, as that term is defined in the CCPA.
label: neutral

text: Upon receipt of a verifiable consumer request, and as required by the CCPA, we will take appropriate steps to respond to your request.
label: neutral

text: Right to Non-Discrimination for the Exercise of Your Privacy Rights.
label: neutral

text: We will not discriminate or retaliate against you for exercising any of the rights described above.
label: neutral

text: Submitting CCPA Rights Requests.
label: neutral

text: To submit a CCPA Rights request as outlined above, please contact us at privacy@datarobot.com or submit a General Inquiry form on https://www.datarobot.com/contact-us/. We reserve the right to only respond to verifiable consumer requests that are submitted as instructed.
label: safe

text: We reserve the right to amend this notice at any time without advance notice.
label: neutral

text: Please direct questions about this notice to privacy@datarobot.com.
label: safe

text: European Union, UK or European Economic Area Residents.
label: neutral
neutral

text: Spouses, Dependents, and Associates.
label: neutral

text: If you have knowledge that the Company collected personal information related to your spouse, dependent, or associate, please share a copy of this notice with all such individuals.
label: neutral
